parameter.value: So you want to leave this place? As you may have noticed, most seafarers won't stay here... for long. So, do you want me to send you back to {Ab'Dendriel}, {Darashia}, {Edron} or {Venore}?
Then stay. I certainly don't mind.
I am waiting. Beyond time and ever watchful. And I expected you, traveller.
|PLAYERNAME|. I have been watching your fate for quite some time. It's about time you came here. Do you seek to enter the riven island of {Quirefang} or {travel} back from where you came?
Some things are not meant to be told, then.
